text: KRUS (1490 AM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Ruston, Louisiana. The station is owned by Red Peach LLC, and airs a gospel music format. The station was assigned the KRUS call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on December 17, 1947. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * FCC Public Inspection File for KRUS * FCC History Card for KRUS * Category:Radio stations in Louisiana Category:Radio stations established in 1947 Category:1947 establishments in Louisiana Category:Gospel radio stations in the United States Category:Lincoln Parish, Louisiana Category:Christian radio stations in Louisiana
title: KRUS
